sub_title: Project Manager, insurance industry and socio-economic scientific research
summary:
My motto:
“All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.”

Held various managerial key positions within the Insurance Services Industry in international settings and matrix organizations. Also, practicing socio-economic scientific research in European and global context.

Constantly engaged in developing people and reliable business solutions - experienced in building and leading effective inter-departmental (incl. back- & front-office) and multi-national (incl. remote) teams of professionals, driven by performance and meaningful innovation. With an entrepreneurial approach, I use my broad expertise and vision to identify opportunities and think up breakthrough strategies. 

My specialties:
• Business strategy (development & implementation)
• Organizational change
• Project management
• Operational excellence
• Product development
• Strategic partnerships, bancassurance, brokerage & corporate agreements
• (Re)Insurance
• Socio-economic scientific research

• Departments: Clinics Network Administration, Underwriting, Policy Administration, Claims, Reporting & Settlements, Reinsurance, Group Insurance.
• Restructured Life business line & optimized processes, improved risk & compliance management; ensured business alignment; increased portfolio profitability & persistency.
• Product development: Unit Linked (incl. web-based), Bancassurance, Traditional Life and Employee Benefits products.
• Business development: multi-channel distribution development through dedicated projects; participated to the conclusion of new partnerships with banks, brokers & reinsurers; member of the M&A Due Diligence Team.

Project Management - implemented various projects resulting in: operations, reporting and sales support optimization & automation, data-driven risk control, intranet settlements platform at company level; new insurance products, development of bancassurance and brokers channels, Unit Linked sales online; delivered the project "International Network Strategies", with members from the Eurapco Alliance; key member within the "Persistency Project" of Division International, Eureko/Achmea Group, concluded with the publication of the "Standardized Eureko Framework in the Management of Persistency".

Company representative in relation to the insurance authorities and associations, and in the international projects, strategic & best practice sharing sessions of the Division International, Eureko/Achmea Group (participating countries: the Netherlands, Belgium, France, Ireland, Greece, Romania, Bulgaria, Turkey, Slovakia and Cyprus).', 'title': 'Life Insurance Manager & Project Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Astra-Uniqa', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Bucharest, Romania', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'company': 'Astra-Uniqa', 'description': '• Built up and lead the Corporate Department (life & non-life insurance, operations and sales), according to the new business strategy developed in partnership with Uniqa Group Austria;
